about.title: About Me
description: Hey there! I'm a creative whirlwind who finds joy in painting, designing sleek visuals on Figma, experimenting in the kitchen, and photography. Dressing up and striking a pose? Absolutely my thing!
Oh, and did I mention my undying love for flowers, elephants, and talking? Yep, I can chat for hours about anything and everything!

contact.title: Contact Me
description: Wanna say hi? Go ahead and email me. I love chit-chatting anyways.
